faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our plans

hosting.question: What does hosting include?
hosting.answer: Server space, SSL, daily backups and sufficient bandwidth. After the first year you can renew or migrate.

changePlan.question: Can I change plans later?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade at any time. You only pay the prorated difference.

moreFeatures.question: What if I need more features?
moreFeatures.answer: We add extra features to any plan with a tailored quote.

sourceCode.question: Is source code included?
sourceCode.answer: Yes, we include full source code and IP rights.

guarantee.question: Do you offer a guarantee?
guarantee.answer: Yes, 30-day guarantee and support to ensure your satisfaction.

payment.question: How does payment work?
payment.answer: 50% upfront and 50% on delivery. For large projects, we work in milestones.

training.question: Is training included?
training.answer: Yes, training to use the admin panel and key tools.

technologies.question: What technologies do you use?
technologies.answer: React, Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS, among others. We choose the best for each project.

customPlan.title: Need a custom plan?
customPlan.subtitle: Contact us for a tailored quote for your needs

hero.title: We Transform Ideas into Digital Reality
hero.subtitle: We are a team passionate about technology, dedicated to creating innovative solutions that drive our clients' success

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: At KopTup, our mission is to empower businesses through innovative and customized technological solutions. We believe that technology should be accessible, efficient and scalable for everyone.
mission.text2: We specialize in turning complex challenges into elegant solutions, combining creativity with technical excellence to deliver products that not only meet but exceed expectations.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every decision and project we undertake

innovation.title: Constant Innovation
innovation.description: We adopt the latest technologies and methodologies to offer cutting-edge solutions.

excellence.title: Passion for Excellence
excellence.description: Every project is an opportunity to exceed expectations and create exceptional products.

creativity.title: Limitless Creativity
creativity.description: We think outside the box to solve complex problems with elegant solutions.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: Clear, honest and constant communication at every stage of the project.

clientFirst.title: Client at the Center
clientFirst.description: Your success is our success. We work as an extension of your team.

results.title: Measurable Results
results.description: We focus on delivering real value and demonstrable ROI in every project.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate professionals with experience in cutting-edge technologies

ronald.name: Ronald Cipagauta
ronald.description: Full Stack Developer with experience in frontend, backend, and AI integration. Specialized in building scalable solutions with React, Node.js, and OpenAI.

johan.name: Johan Mendieta
johan.description: Software developer with experience in frontend, backend, and microservices architecture. Leading OpenAI-powered solutions with embeddings and semantic search.

juan_vargas.name: Juan Vargas
juan_vargas.description: Full Stack Developer specialized in API development, business reporting, and cloud integration with Microsoft 365 and Azure. Expert in AI-powered chatbots.

juan_pablo.name: Juan Pablo Caicedo
juan_pablo.description: Full Stack Developer specialized in design, development, and deployment of web applications. Expert in JavaScript, Microsoft D365, and database management.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: The journey that brought us to where we are today

2019.title: Independent Beginnings
2019.description: Colombian team collaborating with professionals in Mexico. University projects and for small businesses.

2021.title: Backend and Systems Projects
2021.description: Development in Java and Python for e-commerce. Cluster configuration and replication on CentOS. Technical focus on backend.

2022.title: AI Application
2022.description: Machine learning and deep learning models for clients in Costa Rica. Chatbot development for HR processes.

2023.title: Official Registration
2023.description: Chamber of Commerce registration on 03/26/2023. Formalization of operations and service expansion.

2025.title: Healthcare Sector Project
2025.description: Development of solution for presentation to the Ministry of Health in Colombia.
